text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GE63 Raider RGB-010 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 8 GB i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GE63 Raider RGB-010 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 8 GB i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE63 Raider RGB-010 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 8 GB i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the MSI GE63 Raider RGB-010 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 8 GB i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Starfield. The build quality of the MSI GE63 Raider RGB-010 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 8 GB i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
